p: The aim of this research was to study, for the first time, the anti-quorum sensing activity of M. alternifolia essential oil using Chromobacterium violaceum and Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 as bacterial models. Also, this study we aimed to report the chemical composition of the essential oil and the antibacterial activity as of the oil as of terpinen-4-ol against methicillin-resistant S. aureus strains. We indagate also the anti-MRSA biofilm potency of different concentrations of TTO and its main component terpinen-4-ol.
